    Updated to version v3 since v20.9.0.

    Available since v18.11.0.

    HTTP Request

    POST /go/api/stages/:pipeline_name/:pipeline_counter/:stage_name/:stage_counter/run-selected-jobs

    Following property must be specified:

    Attribute Type Description
    jobs Array A list job names that needs to be triggered again. This attribute MUST be specified.

    Returns

    A message confirmation if the request to rerun selected jobs was accepted.

    Stages

    The stages API allows users to operate on a stage.

    Run stage

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/stages/myPipeline/myPipelineRunCounter/myStages/run' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'X-GoCD-Confirm: true' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v2+json' \
      -X POST

    The above command returns the following response:

    HTTP/1.1 202 Accepted
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v2+json;charset=utf-8

    {
  "message" : "Request to schedule stage testAPI/1/defaultStage accepted"
}

    Runs a specified stage.

    Updated to version v2 since v20.1.0.

    Available since v18.11.0.

    HTTP Request

    POST /go/api/stages/:pipeline_name/:pipeline_counter/:stage_name/run

    Returns

    A message confirmation if the request to schedule stage was accepted.

    Users

    The users API allows users with administrator role to manage users.

    The user object

    Available since v15.2.0.

    Attribute Type Description
    login_name String The user’s login name.
    display_name String The user’s display name.
    enabled Boolean Boolean indicating if the user is enabled (can login in).
    email String The user’s email address.
    email_me Boolean Boolean indicating if the user has signed up for email notifications.
    checkin_aliases Array A list of SCM checkin aliases to map users to SCM commits.
    admin Boolean Boolean indicating if the user is an admin. Since v19.1.0.
    roles Array List of user roles that the user has been assigned. Since v19.1.0.

    Get all users

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/users' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "_links": {
    "self": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users"
    },
    "doc": {
      "href": "https://api.gocd.org/#users"
    }
  },
  "_embedded": {
    "users": [
      {
        "_links": {
          "doc": {
            "href": "https://api.gocd.org/#users"
          },
          "self": {
            "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/admin"
          },
          "find": {
            "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/:login_name"
          }
        },
        "login_name": "jdoe",
        "display_name": "John Doe",
        "enabled": true,
        "email": null,
        "email_me": false,
        "admin": false,
        "roles": [{
          "name": "role name",
          "type": "gocd"
        }],
        "checkin_aliases": [
          "jdoe",
          "johndoe"
        ]
      }
    ]
  }
}

    Lists all available users.

    Available since v15.2.0.

    HTTP Request

    GET /go/api/users

    Returns

    An array of user objects.

    Get one user

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/jdoe' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "_links": {
    "doc": {
      "href": "https://api.gocd.org/#users"
    },
    "self": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/jdoe"
    },
    "find": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/:login_name"
    }
  },
  "login_name": "jdoe",
  "display_name": "jdoe",
  "enabled": true,
  "email": null,
  "email_me": false,
  "admin": true,
  "roles": [{
    "name": "role name",
    "type": "gocd"
  }],
  "checkin_aliases": [

  ]
}

    Gets a user by its login name

    Available since v15.2.0.

    HTTP Request

    GET /go/api/users/:login_name

    Returns

    A user object.

    Create a user

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/users' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json' \
      -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
      -X POST \
      -d '{
            "email": "jdoe@example.com",
            "login_name": "jdoe"
          }'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "_links": {
    "doc": {
      "href": "https://api.gocd.org/#users"
    },
    "self": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/jdoe"
    },
    "find": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/:login_name"
    }
  },
  "login_name": "jdoe",
  "display_name": "jdoe",
  "enabled": true,
  "email": null,
  "email_me": false,
  "admin": false,
  "roles": [{
    "name": "role name",
    "type": "gocd"
  }],
  "checkin_aliases": [

  ]
}

    Creates a user

    Available since v15.3.0.

    HTTP Request

    POST /go/api/users

    The following properties may be specified:

    Attribute Type Description
    login_name String The user’s login name. This attribute MUST be specified.
    enabled Boolean Boolean indicating if the user is enabled (can login in).
    email String The user’s email address.
    email_me Boolean Boolean indicating if the user should be signed up for email notifications.
    checkin_aliases Array A list of SCM checkin aliases to map users to SCM commits.

    Returns

    A user object.

    Update a user

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/jdoe' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json' \
      -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
      -X PATCH \
      -d '{
            "email": "jdoe@example.com",
            "email_me": true,
            "checkin_aliases": ["jdoe", "johndoe"]
          }'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "_links": {
    "doc": {
      "href": "https://api.gocd.org/#users"
    },
    "self": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/jdoe"
    },
    "find": {
      "href": "https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/:login_name"
    }
  },
  "login_name": "jdoe",
  "display_name": "jdoe",
  "enabled": false,
  "email": "jdoe@example.com",
  "email_me": true,
  "admin": false,
  "roles": [{
    "name": "role name",
    "type": "gocd"
  }],
  "checkin_aliases": [
    "jdoe",
    "johndoe"
  ]
}

    Update some attributes of a user.

    Available since v15.2.0.

    HTTP Request

    PATCH /go/api/users/:login_name

    Atleast one of the following properties must be specified, not specifying the property will leave it unchanged.

    Attribute Type Description
    enabled Boolean Boolean indicating if the user is enabled (can log in).
    email String The user’s email address.
    email_me Boolean Boolean indicating if the user should be signed up for email notifications.
    checkin_aliases Array A list of SCM checkin aliases to map users to SCM commits.

    Returns

    The updated user object.

    Delete a user

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/users/jdoe' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json' \
      -X DELETE

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "message": "User 'jdoe' was deleted successfully."
}

    Deletes a user.

    You must first disable a user before deleting it.

    Available since v15.2.0.

    HTTP Request

    DELETE /go/api/users/:login_name

    Returns

    A message confirmation if the user was deleted.

    Bulk Delete Users

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/users' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json' \
      -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
      -X DELETE \
      -d '{"users": ["jez", "tez"]}'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "message": "Users '[\"jez\", \"tez\"]' were deleted successfully."
}

    Deletes multiple users.

    You must first disable users before deleting it.

    Available since v17.11.0.

    HTTP Request

    DELETE /go/api/users

    Returns

    A message confirming if the users were deleted.

    Bulk Enable/Disable Users

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/admin/operations/state' \
      -u 'username:password' \
      -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json' \
      -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
      -X PATCH \
      -d '{
            "users": ["jez", "tez"],
            "operations": {
              "enable": true
            }
          }'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v3+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "message": "Users '[\"jez\", \"tez\"]' were enabled successfully."
}

    Enables/Disables multiple users.

    Available since v19.1.0.

    HTTP Request

    PATCH /go/api/users/operations/state

    Returns

    A message confirming if the users were enabled/disabled.

    The user role object

    Available since v19.1.0.

    Attribute Type Description
    type String The type of role (plugin | gocd).
    Name String Name of the role.

    Version

    The Version API allows users to get the GoCD server version details.

    The version object

    Available since v16.6.0.

    Attribute Type Description
    version String The GoCD server version.
    build_number Integer The GoCD server build number.
    git_sha String The git SHA from which this server version was built.
    full_version String The GoCD server full version.
    commit_url String TThe GitHub url to the git_sha.

    Get version

    $ curl 'https://ci.example.com/go/api/version' \
    -H 'Accept: application/vnd.go.cd.v1+json'

    The above command returns JSON structured like this:

    HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/vnd.go.cd.v1+json; charset=utf-8

    {
  "_links": {
    "self": {
      "href": "https://build.go.cd/go/api/version"
    },
    "doc": {
      "href": "https://api.gocd.org/#version"
    }
  },
  "version": "16.6.0",
  "build_number": "3348",
  "git_sha": "a7a5717cbd60c30006314fb8dd529796c93adaf0",
  "full_version": "16.6.0 (3348-a7a5717cbd60c30006314fb8dd529796c93adaf0)",
  "commit_url": "https://github.com/gocd/gocd/commits/a7a5717cbd60c30006314fb8dd529796c93adaf0"
}

    Gets the current GoCD server details

    Available since v16.6.0.

    HTTP Request

    GET /go/api/version

    Returns

    The version object.

    section_marker_placeholder:Other

    Errors

    GoCD uses the following HTTP status codes to indicate errors.

    Error Code Meaning
    400 Bad Request – The request could not be understood. The client SHOULD NOT repeat the request without modifications.
    401 Unauthorized – Your username or password is incorrect or you are not authorized to perform this action.
    403 Forbidden – The resource requested is hidden for administrators only.
    404 Not Found – The specified resource could not be found.
    405 Method Not Allowed – You tried to access a resource with an invalid method.
    406 Not Acceptable – You requested a format that isn’t json.
    409 Conflict – The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
    410 Gone – The resource requested has been removed from our servers.
    412 Precondition Failed – The request could not be completed because the state of the resource is not the latest while being updated.
    422 Unprocessable Entity – The server understood the request, but the request is semantically erroneous.
    500 Internal Server Error – We had a problem with our server. Try again later.
    501 Not implemented – The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
    503 Service Unavailable – We’re temporarially offline for maintanance. Please try again later.

    API Changelog

    The changelog is maintained starting from version 19.2.0 of GoCD. For changes from previous versions, see the release notes at https://gocd.org/releases.

    Changes in 25.1.0

    Added

    Removed

    • No removals in this release

    Deprecations

    • No deprecations in this release

    Changes in 23.2.0

    Added

    • No addition in this release

    Removed

    • The Backups API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Dashboard API version 3 has been removed. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • No deprecations in this release

    Changes in 23.1.0

    Added

    • No addition in this release

    Removed

    • No removals in this release

    Deprecations

    Notifications of these deprecations were missed in earlier releases when new versions were introduced, however due to their limited use, stability over several years and minor changes from the deprecated versions, are planned for removal on an accelerated schedule.

    • The Backups API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v23.2.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Dashboard API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.10.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v23.2.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 21.1.0

    Added

    • No addition in this release

    Removed

    • The Pipeline Config API version 10 has been removed. Version 11 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 1 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 6 has been removed. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 3 has been removed. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Pluggable SCM API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.2.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.2.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.10.0

    Added

    • No changes

    Removed

    • No changes

    Deprecations

    • The Pipeline Config API version 10 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 11 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.1.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.1.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.9.0

    Updated

    • Updated Webhook APIs to add support for pluggable SCMs

    Added

    • Introduced version 4 of the Pluggable SCM API.
      • This version adds readonly property origin. The value of origin will specify whether the SCM is present in a config-repo or is defined in GoCD.
      • The update/delete calls will now return 422 in case the SCM is defined in a config repo.
    • Introduced version 3 of the Secret Config API.
      • This version adds support for cluster_profile as entity type for rules.
    • Stages endpoints have been regrouped and split between Stages and Stage Instances. Also, introduced version 3 of the Stage Instances API.
      • Version 3 of the Stage Instances API updates the Get Stage Instance API to return additional attributes scheduled_at and last_transitioned_time.

    Removed

    • The Scheduled Jobs API has been removed. The Feeds API for Scheduled Jobs is available as a replacement.

    Deprecations

    • The Pipeline Config API version 10 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 11 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.1.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.1.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Stage Instances API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.9.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v21.1.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.8.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 11 of the Pipeline Config API.
      • This version adds support for invert_filter for Plugin Materials to enable AllowList.
    • Introduced version 2 of the Secret Config API.
      • This version adds support for package_repository and pluggable_scm as entity type for rules.
    • Introduced version 7 of the Plugin Info API.
      • This version returns the updated capabilities for Config Repo plugins.
    • Introduced version 4 of the Config Repo API.
      • Config Repo plugins now allows user defined configurations. This version introduces is_secure property for user defined configurations.

    Removed

    • The Agents API version 6 has been removed. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Scheduled Jobs API has beeen deprecated in GoCD release 20.6.0. This API will be removed in GoCD release v20.9.0. As a replacement, a new Feeds API for Scheduled Jobs is introduced.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 10 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 11 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Secret Config API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 3 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.11.0. Version 4 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.7.0

    Added

    • No changes

    Removed

    • No changes

    Deprecations

    • The Agents API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.5.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.8.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Scheduled Jobs API has beeen deprecated in GoCD release 20.6.0. This API will be removed in GoCD release v20.9.0. As a replacement, a new Feeds API for Scheduled Jobs is introduced.

    Changes in 20.6.0

    Added

    Introduced feeds API for Scheduled Jobs.

    Removed

    • The Data Sharing Settings API version 1 has been removed.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 1 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 2 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Packages API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Materials API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Agents API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.5.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.8.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Scheduled Jobs API has beeen deprecated in GoCD release 20.6.0. This API will be removed in GoCD release v20.9.0. As a replacement, a new Feeds API for Scheduled Jobs is introduced.

    Changes in 20.5.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 7 of the Agents API.
      • A new endpoint Kill running tasks API was added in this version.
      • The GET Agents API and GET ‘All Agents’ API has been enhanced to return the agent_version and agent_bootstrapper_version.
      • All other Agents API were just bumped up (version increased to 7) with no change to payload and response.

    Removed

    • The Pipeline Comparison API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 2 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Template Config API version 6 has been removed. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Pluggable SCM API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Packages API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Agents API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.5.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.8.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.4.0

    Added

    -

    Removed

    • The unversioned Job History API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Stage API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Status API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Instance API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Notification Filter API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The older Feeds API in rails has been removed, and is replaced by the re-written new Feeds API Feeds without any changes to the contract.

    Deprecations

    • The Pluggable SCM API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Packages API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Template Config API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.5.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.5.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Comparison API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.5.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.3.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 2 of the Packages API.
      • The Usages API was added in this version.
      • All other Package API were just bumped up (version increased to 2) with no change to payload and response.
    • Introduced version 3 of the SCM API.
      • The Usages API was added in this version.
      • All other Pluggable SCM APIs were just bumped up (version increased to 3) with no change to payload and response.

    Removed

    • The unversioned Agent Job History API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Group Config Listing API has been removed.

    Deprecations

    • The Pluggable SCM API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pluggable SCM API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Packages API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.3.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.6.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Template Config API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.5.0. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.5.0. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Comparison API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.5.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Notification Filter API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.4.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Feeds API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.4.0.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Instance API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.4.0. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Status API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.4.0. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Stage API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.4.0. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Job History API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release v20.4.0. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.2.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 7 of the Template Config API.
    • Introduced version 3 of the Config Repo API.
    • Introduced version 1 of the Permissions API.
    • Introduced version 2 of the Pipeline Comparison API.

    Removed

    • The Auth Config API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Role Config API version 2 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Template Config API version 5 has been removed. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Template Config API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for June 2020. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for June 2020. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Comparison API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.2.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for June 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Notification Filter API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Feeds API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Instance API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Status API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Stage API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Job History API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Group Config Listing API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.12.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020.
    • The unversioned Agent Job History API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.12.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 20.1.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 2 of the Notification Filter API.
    • Introduced newer version of the Feeds API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Pipeline Instance APIs.
    • Introduced version 1 of Pipeline Status API.
    • Introduced version 2 of the Stage API.
    • Introduced version 1 of the Job History API.
    • Introduced version 1 of the Job Instance API.

    Removed

    Deprecations

    • The Notification Filter API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Feeds API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Instance API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Pipeline Status API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Stage API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Job History API has been deprecated in GoCD release v20.1.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for April 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.12.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 1 of the Agent Job History API.
    • Introduced version 6 of the Template Config API.
    • Introduced version 1 of the Comment on pipeline instance.

    Removed

    • The unversioned Cancel Stage API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The unversioned Pipeline Group Config Listing API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.12.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Mar 2020.
    • The unversioned Agent Job History API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.12.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Mar 2020. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Auth Config API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.11.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Jan 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Role Config API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.11.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Jan 2020. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Template Config API version 5 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.12.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for March 2020. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.11.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 3 of the Role Config API.
    • Introduced version 2 of the Auth Config API.
    • Introduced Extract Template API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Site urls API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Artifact Config API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Default Job Timeout API.

    Removed

    • The unversioned Cancel Stage API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Auth Config API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.11.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Jan 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Role Config API version 2 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.11.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Jan 2020. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.10.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 10 of Pipeline Config API. Version 10 of API removes support for properties object in the pipeline config, adds support for the ignore_for_scheduling flag for dependency materials and allows fetch and update of the pipeline group attribute.
    • Introduced version 5 of Template Config API. This was done to remove support for properties object in the template config.
    • Introduced version 2 of the Materials API. This was done to re-enable support for the uuid parameter for Notifying SVN materials, and add the ignore_for_scheduling flag for dependency materials.
    • Introduced version 1 of the Pipeline Comparison API.

    Removed

    • The Plugin Info API version 5 has been removed. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 7 has been removed. Version 10 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 8 has been removed. Version 10 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 9 has been removed. Version 10 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Template Config API version 4 has been removed. Version 5 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The unversioned Cancel Stage API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Nov 2019. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Materials API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.10.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Apr 2020. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.9.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 3 of Environment Config API
    • Introduced version 6 of Agents API

    Removed

    • We have removed the following APIs as a part of this pull request
      • The Environment Config API version 2 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
      • The Agents API version 4 has been removed. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
      • The Agents API version 5 has been removed. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Materials API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Plugin Info API version 5 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.7.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Oct 2019. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 7 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.7.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Oct 2019. Version 9 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Unversioned get all materials API has been deprecated in favor of get all materials API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for Oct 2019.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 8 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Nov 2019. Version 9 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Cancel Stage API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Nov 2019. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.8.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 1 of Mailserver Config API
    • Introduced version 9 of Pipeline Config API.
    • It is now possible to omit the version number by specifying Accept: application/vnd.go.cd+json. This will render the latest version of the API endpoint being invoked.
    • Introduced version 1 of Stage Cancel API.
    • Introduced version 2 of Pluggable SCM API to add support for Delete Pluggable SCM.

    Removed

    • The Pipeline Config API version 6 has been removed. Version 9 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Cookie/Session authentication should no longer be used for API authentication. Users should either use Basic Authentication or Token based authentication for any API requests going forward.
    • Removed support for the Properties API. See this pull request for details.

    Deprecations

    • The Plugin Info API version 5 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.7.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Oct 2019. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 7 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.7.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Oct 2019. Version 9 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Unversioned get all materials API has been deprecated in favor of get all materials API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for Oct 2019.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 8 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Nov 2019. Version 9 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The unversioned Cancel Stage API has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.8.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Nov 2019. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.7.0

    No changes. 19.7.0 was primarily a bugfix release.

    Deprecations

    • The Pipeline Config API version 6 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.6.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Aug 2019. Version 8 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Config Repo API version 1 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.6.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Aug 2019. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 5 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.7.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Oct 2019. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 7 has been deprecated in GoCD release v19.7.0. This version will be removed in GoCD release scheduled for Oct 2019. Version 8 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Unversioned get all materials API has been deprecated in favor of get all materials API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for Oct 2019.

    Changes in 19.6.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 1 of Materials API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Secret Configs API.
    • Introduced version 6 of Plugin Info API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Backup Config API.

    Removed

    • The Stage History unversioned API has been removed. Version 1 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 4 has been removed. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • The Pipeline Config API version 6 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for August 2019. Version 8 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 5 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for August 2019. Version 6 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Unversioned Materials API has been deprecated in favor of Materials API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for October 2019.

    Changes in 19.5.0

    Removed

    • The Dashboard API version 2 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Deprecations

    • Unversioned get stage history API has been deprecated in favor of get stage history API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for July 2019.
    • The Plugin Info API version 4 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for July 2019. Version 5 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The ConfigRepo API version 1 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for August 2019. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 6 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for August 2019. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.4.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 2 of Config Repo API.
    • Introduced version 7 of Pipeline Config API.

    Removed

    No removals this release.

    Deprecations

    • Unversioned get stage history API has been deprecated in favor of get stage history API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for July 2019.
    • The Dashboard API version 2 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for June 2019. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 4 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for July 2019. Version 5 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The ConfigRepo API version 1 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for August 2019. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Pipeline Config API version 6 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for August 2019. Version 7 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.3.0

    Added

    • Introduced version 2 of Backup API.
    • Introduced version 5 of Plugin Info API.
    • Introduced version 2 of Elastic Agent Profiles API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Cluster Profiles API.
    • Introduced version 1 of Stage History API.
    • Introduced version 5 of Agents API.

    Removed

    • The Dashboard API version 1 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The System Admins API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Roles API version 1 has been removed. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Users API version 2 has been removed. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Unversioned Get Stage Instance API has been removed in favor of Get Stage Instance API v1.

    Deprecations

    • Unversioned get stage history API has been deprecated in favor of get stage history API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for July 2019.
    • The Dashboard API version 2 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for June 2019. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Plugin Info API version 4 has been deprecated. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for July 2019. Version 5 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.

    Changes in 19.2.0

    Added

    • This version adds support for API tokens. See bearer token authentication for using tokens to authenticate with the GoCD server.

    Removed

    No removals this release.

    Deprecations

    • The Dashboard API v1 has been deprecated. This version of the API will be removed in a release scheduled for March 2019. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • Unversioned Get Stage Instance API has been deprecated in favor of Get Stage Instance API v1. This version will be removed in a release scheduled for April 2019.
    • The Users API v2 has been deprecated. This version of the API will be removed in a release scheduled for April 2019. Version 3 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The System Admins API v1 has been deprecated. This version of the API will be removed in a release scheduled for April 2019. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    • The Roles API v1 has been deprecated. This version of the API will be removed in a release scheduled for April 2019. Version 2 of the API is available, and users are encouraged to use it.
    shell
